Source code for src.entities.promotions.Promotion

__author__ = 'ezequiel'



[docs]class Promotion:
    # Constructor

[docs]    def __init__(self, name, percentage, minim):
        """

        Init method for Promotion of an article

        :param name: promotion name
        :param percentage: percentage reduction of article
        :param minim: minim reduction number

        """
        self.name = name
        self.percentage = percentage
        self.minim = minim
        self.article_list = []
        self.org = None
        self.promotion = None

    # Getters and setters


[docs]    def get_name(self):
        """
        Get promotion name

        :return: promotion name

        """
        return self.name



[docs]    def set_name(self, name):
        """

        Update actual promotion name

        :param name: New promotion name

        """
        self.name = name



[docs]    def get_percentage(self):
        """

        Get reduction percentage of article

        :return: reduction percentage

        """
        return self.percentage

        """

        Update actual reduction percentage of article

        :param percentage: new reduction percentage

        """
        self.percentage = percentage



[docs]    def get_minim(self):
        """

        Get minim reduction percentage of article

        :return: minim reduction percentage

        """
        return self.minim

        """

        Update actual minim reduction percentage of article

[docs]    def get_promotion(self):
        """

        Get promotion instance

        :return: promotion

        """
        return self.org



[docs]    def set_promotion(self, promotion):
        """

        Update actual promotion instance

        :param promotion: new promotion

        """
        self.promotion = promotion



[docs]    def __str__(self):
        """

        Print promotion information

        :return: String instance

        """
        return self.name + " - " + str(self.percentage)

    # Main methods



[docs]    def is_article(self, art):
        """
        Helper method that returns True if the article is already in the list or False if it's not

        :param art: Article to be checked
        """

        for article in self.article_list:
            if article.ean13 == art.ean13:
                return True
        return False



[docs]    def add_article(self, article):
        """

        Add new article to promotion

        :param article:  new article
        :return: if it correct what the article is added

        """

        if not self.is_article(article):
            self.article_list.append(article)
            return True
        else:
            return False



[docs]    def remove_article(self, article):
        """

        Remove an article to promotion

        :param article:  exist article
        :return: if it correct what the article is removed

        """

        if self.is_article(article):
            self.article_list.remove(article)
            return True
        else:
            return False
